EmailTemplate.subject: Are you able to get the latest Self-Checkout capabilities with your current hardware?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Legacy Self-Checkouts can be challenging for retailers to manage. With no OS support, you’re faced with security issues that can seem daunting.
And beyond that – the likelihood your legacy hardware can handle the latest software capabilities to support customer expectations about speedy checkout, is low.
Upgrade your technology today and learn what new hardware can mean for your business. Want to learn more? Reply to this email <[[mailto:Jimmy.Staiti@ncr.com]]>.
Best,Jimmy Staiti Retail Specialist, NCR Corporation
